dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation!!
dmca.body:
NC

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2005 12:54 PM
To: WebmasterGV
Cc: poastmaster@www.phpbb.com; legal@glamourvision.com;
copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation!!

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

WebmasterGV wrote:
| Dear Sirs,
|         It appears that your internet site
| http://cm.adorablebunnies.com is being used to illegally distribute our
| copyrighted materials. We ask that you Immediately cease this illegal
| activity.
|
|
|         Here are some examples of the copyrighted materials that your
| internet site appears to be illegally distributing:
|
|
| /http://cm.adorablebunnies.com/T/7d72/3.4679451627271/UPLOAD/gl6.jpg/
|
| /http://cm.adorablebunnies.com/T/323c/3.4679452850547/UPLOAD/gl4.jpg/
|
| http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl7.jpg
|
| http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl6.jpg
|
| http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl5.jpg
|
| http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl4.jpg
|
|  gl7.jpg
| <http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl7.jpg>

| 04-Jan-2005 01:34  139k
| gl6.jpg
| <http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl6.jpg>

| 04-Jan-2005 01:33   75k
| gl5.jpg
| <http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl5.jpg>

| 04-Jan-2005 01:33  111k
| gl4.jpg
| <http://adorablebunnies.com/LOADER/UPLOAD/gl4.jpg>

| 04-Jan-2005 01:33   84k
|
|
|
|         We have identified the IP of the individual that we believe is
| currently illegally distributing these copyrighted materials. We believe
| that this is their IP address:
|
| /81.77.130.59/
|
|
|
|             Now that you have been notified of the possible illegal
| activity that is occurring on your site, if your site continues to allow
| the illegal copyright violations to occur, we will assume that you are a
| willing participant in the illegal activity.
|
|             Please reply to this e-mail within 48 hours and let us know
| if you will stop your involvement with this illegal activity.
|
|             If we don't hear from you within 48 hours we will begin
| legal actions.
|
|
|
| Webmaster
| GlamourVision.com
| http://www.GlamourVision.com
|
|
|
|
|
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

=Hhcq
